text: Presidential elections were held in Colombia on 30 May 1982.Nohlen, D (2005) Elections in the Americas: A data handbook, Volume II, p305 The result was a victory for Belisario Betancur of the Conservative Party–National Movement, who received 46.8% of the vote.Nohlen, p354 ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Candidate !Party !Votes !% |- |align=left|Belisario Betancur||align=left|Conservative Party–National Movement||3,189,278||46.8 |- |align=left|Alfonso López Michelsen||align=left|Liberal Party||2,797,627||41.0 |- |align=left|Luis Carlos Galán||align=left|New Liberalism||745,738||10.9 |- |align=left|Gerardo Molina||align=left|Democratic Front||82,858||1.2 |- |align=left|Florentino Porras Pardo||align=left|Popular Claim||159||0.0 |- |align=left colspan=2|Others||6,142||0.1 |- |align=left colspan=2|Invalid/blank votes||18,590||– |- |align=left colspan=2|Total||6,840,392||100 |- |align=left colspan=2|Registered voters/turnout||13,734,093||49.8 |- |align=left colspan=4|Source: Nohlen |} ==References== Category:Presidential elections in Colombia Category:1982 elections in South America Category:1982 in Colombia
title: 1982 Colombian presidential election
